title: Path effects not working on .NET 5
body:
**Description**

Path effects not working on .NET 5

**Code**

```
 SKPaint paint = new SKPaint
    {
        Style = SKPaintStyle.Stroke,
        Color = SKColors.Blue,
        StrokeWidth = 10,
        StrokeCap = (SKStrokeCap)strokeCapPicker.SelectedItem,
        PathEffect = SKPathEffect.CreateDash(GetPickerArray(dashArrayPicker), 20)
    };

    SKPath path = new SKPath();
    path.MoveTo(0.2f * info.Width, 0.2f * info.Height);
    path.LineTo(0.8f * info.Width, 0.8f * info.Height);
    path.LineTo(0.2f * info.Width, 0.8f * info.Height);
    path.LineTo(0.8f * info.Width, 0.2f * info.Height);

    canvas.DrawPath(path, paint);
```

**Expected Behavior**

Paint applies a dash effect.

**Actual Behavior**

Every call gives the following output: `Unsupported path effect in addPaint.` The path is painted as a solid line.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.88.3
- Last known good version:  ???
- IDE:  Visual Studio 2022 17.5.2
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  
<details>
  <summary>Detailed IDE/OS information (click to expand)</summary>
  
```

PASTE ANY DETAILED VERSION INFO HERE

```
</details>
